opts.opt: {Double}Double (two graves side by side in the one plot, e.g. husband/wife)
{Engraved}Incised or chiselled into the material of the marker
{Lead}Individual lead letters attached to the marker
{Engraved_and_Painted}Incised into the material with painted letters
{Painted_Only}No incision, letters painted directly on to the marker
{Emotive} Use of emotive words or phrases to describe them or their death.
{Biographical} Details about their life, e.g. where they were born, where they lived, etc
{Factual} No embellishment, use of simple and direct language.
{Religious} e.g. Bible verses, or appeals to God
{Written_in_first_person}First person (as if the deceased is speaking directly to you – “I”, “Me”)
{Written_in_third_person}Third person (the deceased is being spoken about – “He”, “She”)
{On_marker}Identify all motifs incorporated into the marker/headstone. This includes the shape of the marker and all engraved, painted or applied motifs.
{On_fence_other}Identify all motifs incorporated into the fence or other fittings/furnishings.
